account.descriptionLink: XIP 12 proposes redirecting 20% of tokens from the Buy & Burn mechanism to XNETâ€™s liquidity pool on Raydium. This change aims to enhance token stability, reduce slippage, and improve accessibility without fully compromising deflationary pressure. 60% of tokens will still be burned, while 20% supports liquidity and 20% covers operating expenses. LP tokens received will be burned to ensure long-term commitment to liquidity provisioning. https://xnet-mobile.gitbook.io/xnet-mobile-docs/xnet-foundation/foundatio
account.name: XIP 12: Liquidity Allocation from Buy & Burn
